title: Help
body: My limit of credit card has reached  but now after 1 day i can't still make a payment whit my card ... what should i do ?

replies.body: Usually you may want to wait at the very least a full 24 hours before attempting more purchases if you're locked out now, but it's generally a good idea to wait a bit longer or even 2 full days to make sure the old attempts had fallen off. If you're having problems after a few days, hit up our billing agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for more 1v1 help!
